description: South Buffalo gets to experience fruity, fun, and flavorful tropical thrills, thanks to Kona Ice and its wonderfully chilly Hawaiian shaved ice treats. When you hear their delightfully inviting Calypso tunes, you know its time to head over to Kona and get yourself a big cup of fluffy shaved ice, then hit up the Flavorwave™, and concoct your own tasty creation with this sensational selection of all your favorite flavors. If you could go for a sweet summery experience, Kona Ice is the truck for you. And don’t forget to ask about their Gather & Get Back Program, and see how much fun Kona Ice could help make your next fundraising event.
name: Kona Ice of South Buffalo
